problem_names:
lemma weakSimI[case_names Sim]:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs

  assumes "\<And>\<alpha> Q'. Q \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'. P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and> (P', Q') \<in> Rel"

  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q"

lemma weakSimE:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>   :: act
  and   Q'  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q"
  and     "Q \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

  obtains P' where "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'" and "(P', Q') \<in> Rel"

lemma simTauChain:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   Q'  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'"
  and     "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     Sim: "\<And>R S. (R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> R \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> S"

  obtains P' where "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'" and "(P', Q') \<in> Rel"

lemma simE2:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>   :: act
  and   Q'  :: ccs

  assumes "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"
  and     Sim: "\<And>R S. (R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> R \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> S"
  
  obtains P' where "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'" and "(P', Q') \<in> Rel"

lemma reflexive:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  
  assumes "Id \<subseteq> Rel"

  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> P"

lemma transitive:
  fixes P     :: ccs
  and   Rel   :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q     :: ccs
  and   Rel'  :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   R     :: ccs
  and   Rel'' :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  
  assumes "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     "Q \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel'> R"
  and     "Rel O Rel' \<subseteq> Rel''"
  and     "\<And>S T. (S, T) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> S \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> T"
  
  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel''> R"

lemma weakMonotonic:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   A :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   B :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<A> Q"
  and     "A \<subseteq> B"

  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<B> Q"

lemma simWeakSim:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs

  assumes "P \<leadsto>[Rel] Q"
  
  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q"
translations:
lemma weakSimI[case_names Sim]:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs

  assumes "\<And>\<alpha> Q'. Q \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'. P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and> (P', Q') \<in> Rel"

  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<longmapsto>?\<alpha> \<prec> ?Q' \<Longrightarrow>
  \<exists>P'.
     P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^?\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
     (P', ?Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q

lemma weakSimE:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>   :: act
  and   Q'  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q"
  and     "Q \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

  obtains P' where "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'" and "(P', Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q
  Q \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

lemma simTauChain:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   Q'  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'"
  and     "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     Sim: "\<And>R S. (R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> R \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> S"

  obtains P' where "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'" and "(P', Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  (P, Q) \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (P, Q) \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis
obtain P'' where "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P''" and "(P'', Q'') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (P, Q) \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P''.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
         (P'', Q'') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (P'', Q'') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P'' \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q''
obtain P' where "P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P'" and "(P', Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P'' \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  P'' \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q''
  Q'' \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (chain)
picking this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P''
  P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P'
  (P', Q') \<in> Rel

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P''
  P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P'
  (P', Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis
by(force simp add: weakTrans_def weakCongTrans_def intro: Step)

proof (state)
this:
  thesis

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma simE2:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>   :: act
  and   Q'  :: ccs

  assumes "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"
  and     Sim: "\<And>R S. (R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> R \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> S"
  
  obtains P' where "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'" and "(P', Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
assume Goal: "\<And>P'. \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'; (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis"

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> ?P';
   (?P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> ?P';
   (?P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P';
         (P', Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P'.
       P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
       (P', Q') \<in> Rel

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<alpha> = \<tau>; Q = Q'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'.
                         P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<and>
                         (P', Q) \<in> Rel
 2. Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>P'.
       P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
       (P', Q') \<in> Rel

proof (state)
this:
  \<alpha> = \<tau>
  Q = Q'

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<alpha> = \<tau>; Q = Q'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'.
                         P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<and>
                         (P', Q) \<in> Rel
 2. Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>P'.
       P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
       (P', Q') \<in> Rel

proof (prove)
using this:
  (P, Q) \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P'.
       P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<and> (P', Q) \<in> Rel

     P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<and> (P', Q) \<in> Rel

obtain Q''' Q''
    where QChain: "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'''" and Q'''Trans: "Q''' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q''" and Q''Chain: "Q'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'"

using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P''
  (P'', Q'') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>P'.
       P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
       (P', Q') \<in> Rel

proof (chain)
picking this:
  Q'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  (P'', Q'') \<in> Rel
  (?R, ?S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> ?R \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> ?S
obtain P' where P''Chain: "P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'" and "(P', Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  (P'', Q'') \<in> Rel
  (?R, ?S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> ?R \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> ?S

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'.
        \<lbrakk>P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';

        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  (P', Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>P'.
       P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
       (P', Q') \<in> Rel

proof (chain)
picking this:
  P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P''
  P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'

proof (prove)
using this:
  P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P''

goal (1 subgoal):

       P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
       (P', Q') \<in> Rel

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<alpha> = \<tau>; P''' = P'';
     P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
     Q \<Longrightarrow>\<tau> \<prec> Q'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'.
                         P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<and>
                         (P', Q') \<in> Rel
 2. \<lbrakk>P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'';
     P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
     Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'\<rbrakk>

  P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'

  P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'

  P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<Longrightarrow>

  P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'

  P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P' \<Longrightarrow>

     P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
     Q \<Longrightarrow>\<tau> \<prec> Q'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'.
                         P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<and>
                         (P', Q') \<in> Rel
 2. \<lbrakk>P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'';
     P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
     Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'.
                         P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
                         (P', Q') \<in> Rel

picking this:
  (P', Q') \<in> Rel
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P'

using this:
  (P', Q') \<in> Rel
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P'

lemma reflexive:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  
  assumes "Id \<subseteq> Rel"

  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> P"

proof (prove)
using this:
  Id \<subseteq> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> P
by(auto simp add: weakSimulation_def intro: transitionWeakCongTransition weakCongTransitionWeakTransition)

lemma transitive:
  fixes P     :: ccs
  and   Rel   :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q     :: ccs
  and   Rel'  :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   R     :: ccs
  and   Rel'' :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  
  assumes "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     "Q \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel'> R"
  and     "Rel O Rel' \<subseteq> Rel''"
  and     "\<And>S T. (S, T) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> S \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> T"
  
  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel''> R"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<alpha> Q'.
       R \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
          (P', Q') \<in> Rel''

proof (state)
this:
  R \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> R'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<alpha> Q'.
       R \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
          (P', Q') \<in> Rel''

proof (prove)
using this:
  R \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> R'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P'.
       P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
       (P', R') \<in> Rel''

proof (prove)
using this:
  R \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> R'
  (P, Q) \<in> Rel
  Q \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel'> R
  Rel O Rel' \<subseteq> Rel''
  (?S, ?T) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> ?S \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> ?T

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P'.
       P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
       (P', R') \<in> Rel''

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>P'.
     P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
     (P', R') \<in> Rel''

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma weakMonotonic:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   A :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   B :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<A> Q"
  and     "A \<subseteq> B"

  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<B> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<A> Q
  A \<subseteq> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<B> Q

lemma simWeakSim:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs

  assumes "P \<leadsto>[Rel] Q"
  
  shows "P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto>[Rel] Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<Rel> Q

by(rule_tac weakSimI, auto)
  (blast dest: simE transitionWeakTransition)
